description: JSON schema for settings for primer3 for prinia

primer_internal_min_gc.description: Equivalent parameter of primer_min_gc for the internal oligo.

primer_internal_max_gc.description: Equivalent parameter of primer_max_gc for the internal oligo.

primer_wt_gc_percent_lt.description: Penalty weight for primers with GC-percentage lower than primer_opt_gc_percent

primer_internal_wt_gc_percent_lt.description: Equivalent parameter of primer_wt_gc_percent_lt for the interal oligo.

primer_wt_gc_percent_gt.description: Penality weight for primers with GC-percentage higher than primer_opt_gc_percent

primer_internal_wt_gc_percent_gt.description: Equivalent parameter of primer_wt_gc_percent_gt for the internal oligo.

primer_gc_clamp.description: Require the specified number of consecutive Gs and Cs at the 3' end of both the left and right primer.

primer_max_end_gc.description: The maximum number of Gs or Cs allowed in the last five 3' bases of a left or right primer.

primer_opt_size.description: Optimum size of primers in bases.

primer_min_size.description: Minimum size of primers in bases.

primer_max_size.description: Maximum size of primers in bases.

primer_max_ns_accepted.description: Maximum number of unknown bases (N) accepted in a primer

primer_product_size_range.description: Accepted size range of the product size.

primer_product_opt_size.description: Optimum size of product. Will default to the midpoint in primer_product_size_range unless specified

primer_pair_wt_product_size_gt.description: Penalty weight for products larger than primer_product_opt_size

primer_pair_wt_product_size_lt.description: Penalty weight for products smaller than primer_product_opt_size

primer_min_tm.description: Minimum melting temperature of primer degrees Celsius

primer_max_tm.description: Maximum melting temperature in degrees Celsius

primer_num_return.description: Number of returned primers. Increase to increase search space
